agentBackend.description: This agent focuses on the backend integration with Supabase and Next.js server-side logic. It handles data retrieval, authentication flows, route handlers, and any server-side transformations needed before rendering or saving user data.

responsibilities.item: Managing API routes in the Next.js App Router (e.g., /app/api/â€¦ or route handlers).
Integrating with Supabase for user authentication, notes, bookmarks, and fellowship data queries.
Server-side rendering of data via React Server Components where possible to reduce client overhead.
Implementing error handling, logging, and revalidation strategies (ISR, caching, etc.).
Scheduling tasks or cron-like jobs for emailing reminders or refreshing data.

deliverables.item: Supabase client/server setup (createClient, route handlers, SSR queries).
API endpoints for notes, bookmarks, fellowship data, collaboration features.
Error boundaries, efficient data-fetch strategies, and caching policies.
Integration with any external email or push notification service for deadline reminders.
